overview: The DVD contains live recordings from the Tokyo show (Shinjuku BLAZE). Songs performed include "Still in The Dark," "Holy Orders (Be Just Or Be Dead)," "Wanna be Crazy," "HEAVY DAY," and many more .The package includes many popular songs that allow you to experience the atmosphere of a live performance. Some of the songs from the Osaka concert are also included as bonus tracks.
title: Røckon2 Night -Guilty Gear Live 2016-
